AzureAd.ClientId: [Enter client ID of the first app as obtained from Azure Portal, e.g. 82692da5-a86f-44c9-9d53-2f88d52b478b]
AzureAd.ClientSecret: [Enter app key of the first app as obtained from Azure Portal, e.g. rZJJ9bHSi/cYnYwmQFxLYDn/6EfnrnIfKoNzv9NKgbo]

ConnectionStrings.TokenCacheDbConnStr: [Enter the Sql server connection string, e.g. Server=MY_SQL_SERVER;Database=MsalTokenCacheDatabase;Trusted_Connection=True;
